name: Cold War Escalation
description:
Cold War Escalation is a turn based hex war game, much like the Panzer generals of years past.

It is a completely fictional story of NATO forces engaging with Warsaw Pact forces during the 1980's in Europe. 

Features-

- 8 Different unit types including: Infantry, Artillery and Armour Platoons.
- 5 Missions in which you control various NATO forces carrying out numerous mission types.
- A mission progress save system.
- Music, weapon and movement effects.

Although rather basic, this game is fully playable and is released as freeware.

Warsaw pact missions were planned but never added in, this was made over the course of a week during the first lockdown.

Enjoy!
